title: Definitions
context: ยง412:3-602 Definitions. As used in this part: &ldquo;Participating institution&rdquo; means one or all of the financial institutions (or, where applicable, financial institution holding companies) participating in a merger or consolidation pursuant to this part. &ldquo;Resulting institution&rdquo; means the financial institution resulting from a merger, consolidation or conversion pursuant to this part. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1]
